text_block_list.text:
The "Selection Race" - it's an important stage for horse girls 
to appeal to trainers as they aim to make their debut.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
This is overwhelming! She lives up to her reputation and 
finishes 2 lengths ahead of the pack!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
You! If you're in my charge, you can 
win a Graded Race… no, a G1 race!

text_block_list.name: First Place Horse Girl
text_block_list.text: Oh, thank you very much! I'll do my best!

That's why the horse girls do their best, and their trainers 
must be ready to bear their dreams with them.

I want to help them reach their dreams! I was so enthusiastic, 
but when it came time to scout, I couldn't help but shy away.

In the end, the morning portion of the Selection Race ended, 
and I hadn't approached anyone.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: “Are you having trouble finding your ideal horse girl?"

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Fufu～ sorry for the sudden appearance. My name is Super Creek.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: You're new here at Tracen Academy, aren't you, Trainer-san?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hmmm… some reason or another.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
"I saw that were hesitant to approach, and that you were 
feeling pressured by the spirit of the other trainers."

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
But I'm sure there are horse girls waiting to be scouted by 
you, so please have courage.

I can't believe that instead of encouraging the horse girls, 
I'm being encouraged by one… I pondered that.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
……seems like there's some reason you're 
having a hard time speaking up.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Sometimes talking to someone can help you sort out those 
feelings. You can share those fuzzy feelings with me, ok?
choice_data_list: I'm new here, and I don't know how far I can go.
I'm new here, and I don't know how far I can go.

text_block_list.text:
The thought that a trainer with more experience than me would 
be better for the horse girls who are seriously pursuing their 
dreams… I conveyed those feelings.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: ……I see. So that's how things are.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Everyone's a little cautious when they first start out. That's 
just the flip side of being serious.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san is kind, considerate, and full of responsibility… 
at least that's what I've gathered.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
And, just so you know, I'll be in the afternoon race. If it's 
alright, would you like to come watch?
choice_data_list: I'll be there to cheer you on.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Fufu～ thank you very much. I'll do my very best!
Her warm smile and kind words gave me a great sense of security.

And then, the afternoon race - the one 
Super Creek was running in - had begun.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
“The racers are rounding the first corner! It's Super Creek 
breaking from the pack!"

Her dominating performance did not wane, 
even in the final stages of the race.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Super Creek is in the lead, and just like 
that, she crosses the finish line!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Creek! Let's win a G1 race together!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer B
text_block_list.text: I'll make your talents flourish!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Goodness～ thank you very much for those expectations.

text_block_list.name: Mid-level Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Super Creek. You're as talented as I anticipated. If you sign 
with me, I promise to make your training top priority.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Y-you…! There's no way you'd keep your 
mouth shut in the face of such talent….

Even one of the most experienced trainers 
at the school wants to scout her.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Oh my gosh, to be asked by such a famous 
trainer. It's such an honor!

It makes sense… an incredible horse girl of her 
stature should be more than happy to go with a 
trainer who has what it takes to train her.

If you put the horse girl first, surely you can 
get the best out of her… With those thoughts in 
my head, I was ready to take my leave, until―

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer-san, please wait!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Yes♪

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I've been approached by so many other people, but I want to be 
partnered with you, Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
H-hey! What are you talking about? That trainer has no track 
record, he's just a rookie!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Ah, well, even though he's new, he's still a trainer. Isn't 
that right, Trainer-san?

Her smile as she said this was filled with the same great sense 
of security as earlier, when she encouraged me.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Will you have me as your horse girl?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Fufu～ that's good to hear. I look forward to working with you.
And so, I took my first step towards becoming a trainer.
